state_description: The initial screen of CleanMyMac X, offering a Smart Scan to clean, optimize, and protect the Mac.

enables.name: Smart Scan
enables.description: Initiates a comprehensive scan of the Mac to clean system junk, detect malware, and optimize performance.

enables.name: System Junk
enables.description: Navigates to the System Junk cleaning module to remove unnecessary files.

enables.name: Mail Attachments
enables.description: Navigates to the Mail Attachments module to clear old mail attachments.

enables.name: Trash Bins
enables.description: Navigates to the Trash Bins module to empty trash bins.

enables.name: Malware Removal
enables.description: Navigates to the Malware Removal module to scan and remove malware.

enables.name: Privacy
enables.description: Navigates to the Privacy module to manage privacy settings and clear traces of online activity.

enables.name: Optimization
enables.description: Navigates to the Optimization module to improve Mac performance.

enables.name: Maintenance
enables.description: Navigates to the Maintenance module for routine system maintenance tasks.

enables.name: Uninstaller
enables.description: Navigates to the Uninstaller module to remove applications completely.

enables.name: Updater
enables.description: Navigates to the Updater module to update installed applications.

enables.name: Extensions
enables.description: Navigates to the Extensions module to manage system extensions.

enables.name: Space Lens
enables.description: Navigates to the Space Lens module to visualize disk space usage.

enables.name: Large & Old Files
enables.description: Navigates to the Large & Old Files module to find and remove large and old files.

enables.name: Shredder
enables.description: Navigates to the Shredder module to securely delete files.
